title: Veigar E changes on pbe

embed.description: Note: Mordekaiser's changes are not working properly - while the tooltips were updated, a lot of it seems to not actually be changed in-game.] The PBE has been updated! Today's update includes a slew of kit changes for Mordekaiser and Veigar, a new splash art for Tristana, tweaks to Summoner's Rift terrain, and more!

body:
Ok so I being an main veigar player in ranked I really like most of changes riot is bringing in for veigar. BUT i think that the change for his may of damaged his ability to kill champions him due to the 0.75 alert time that players now have before his stun comes up it will be a lot easier for people to dodge his stun, I feel that i will have to get used too a new veigar play style.
I want to know the communities point of view on this change.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=darkclouds97,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=vLynoOXv,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-15T04:05:28.825+0000)
>
> Ok so I being an main veigar player in ranked I really like most of changes riot is bringing in for veigar. BUT i think that the change for his may of damaged his ability to kill champions him due to the 0.75 alert time that players now have before his stun comes up ***it will be a lot easier for people to dodge his stun***, I feel that i will have to get used too a new veigar play style.
> I want to know the communities point of view on this change.

That's the point. They have buffed Veigar in terms of damage so to compensate they made his stun more 'healthy'  for the game. Its not fun not being instantly stunned without counter play.

I honestly love the new changes, more ap from the q, more sustain damage... I feel like this has made room to drop a couple of ap items and build him slightly tankier, which gives you more time to plan when to drop that e, and more rotations on q.. and you can land w in teamfights pretty easily without e so I am over hearing people say they will never land a w again...  the way i see it, you should only need {{item:3089}}, build some situational tank items and stack that q. no more uber squishy assasin veigar, hello tanky ap bruiser with half decent sustain dmg.

Personally I think it sucks for newer players. Veigar was very much a champion more experienced players could recommend because
- He required little skill when using his abilities
- His Q encouraged them to learn how to last hit.
- Could still feel meaningful late game because of surprise E and R scaling off opposing player's AP.

Veigar can still do these things but it is harder now. Good for players who have been playing for a while but it just adds more complexity for new players.
